searchUrl.title: Search URL (Optional)
searchUrl.description: Direct Naukri.com search URL to scrape from. If provided, other search parameters will be ignored. Example: https://www.naukri.com/sales-jobs-in-mumbai

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: Job title or keywords to search for (e.g., 'sales', 'software engineer', 'data analyst', 'marketing manager'). Required if searchUrl is not provided.

location.title: Location
location.description: Optional location filter (e.g., 'Mumbai', 'Delhi', 'Bangalore'). Leave empty to search without a location.

maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape (0 = unlimited). Default is 20 for optimal performance.

experience.title: Experience Level
experience.description: Filter by required years of experience

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for bypassing anti-bot protection. Recommended for reliable scraping.
